Package org.eclipse.ptp.debug.core

Interface IPSession

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable
    public interface IPSession
extends org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable
    Interface for managing debugger session
